entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , La Ronge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -11.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Ronge Airport 9:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -11.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 9:54 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 9:54 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the evening. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 9:54 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
